/usr/bin/c++   -std=c++14 -O3 -DNDEBUG  -rdynamic CMakeFiles/ex2.dir/src/main.cpp.o CMakeFiles/ex2.dir/src/measurements.cpp.o CMakeFiles/ex2.dir/src/options.cpp.o CMakeFiles/ex2.dir/src/prealloc.cpp.o CMakeFiles/ex2.dir/src/size.cpp.o CMakeFiles/ex2.dir/src/utils.cpp.o  -o ex2   -L/home/sl/isa-l/ex2_ISALErasurecodeandrecovery/./libs/usr/lib  -Wl,-rpath,/home/sl/isa-l/ex2_ISALErasurecodeandrecovery/./libs/usr/lib -lisal -lboost_program_options
